YEAR_BUILT_027_DIFF.description: The number of years that have elapsed since the bridge was originally constructed, representing its structural age and exposure to long-term deterioration processes.

TRAFFIC_LANES_ON_028A.description: The total count of traffic lanes carried directly on the bridge deck, reflecting its traffic-carrying capacity and functional role in the roadway network.

TRAFFIC_LANES_UND_028B.description: The total count of traffic lanes that pass beneath the bridge, indicating the scale and complexity of the facility or corridor being crossed.

ADT_029.description: The estimated average number of vehicles that cross the bridge per day, representing typical traffic demand and cumulative loading effects.

APPR_WIDTH_MT_032.description: The clear width of the roadway approaching the bridge, measured in meters, reflecting how traffic is funneled onto the structure.

MAIN_UNIT_SPANS_045.description: The number of individual spans that make up the main structural unit of the bridge, indicating structural segmentation and load distribution.

APPR_SPANS_046.description: The number of spans in the approach portions of the bridge, representing how the structure transitions between the main unit and adjacent roadway.

MAX_SPAN_LEN_MT_048.description: The length of the longest individual span in the bridge, reflecting structural scale, span capability, and design demands.

STRUCTURE_LEN_MT_049.description: The total longitudinal length of the bridge from end to end, including main and approach spans, representing overall structural extent.

LEFT_CURB_MT_050A.description: The width of the left-side curb, sidewalk, or shoulder on the bridge, indicating pedestrian accommodation or lateral separation from traffic.

RIGHT_CURB_MT_050B.description: The width of the right-side curb, sidewalk, or shoulder on the bridge, indicating pedestrian accommodation or lateral separation from traffic.

ROADWAY_WIDTH_MT_051.description: The clear roadway width between curbs or barriers on the bridge deck, representing the usable width available for vehicle traffic.

DECK_WIDTH_MT_052.description: The total out-to-out width of the bridge deck, including traffic lanes, shoulders, curbs, and barriers, representing the full structural width.

LAT_UND_MT_055B.description: The minimum horizontal clearance available on the right side beneath the bridge, indicating constraints for vehicles or features passing below.

LEFT_LAT_UND_MT_056.description: The minimum horizontal clearance available on the left side beneath the bridge, indicating constraints for vehicles or features passing below.

DATE_OF_INSPECT_090_DIFF.description: The number of years that have elapsed since the bridgeâ€™s most recent routine inspection, reflecting how current the condition information is.

INSPECT_FREQ_MONTHS_091.description: The scheduled interval between routine inspections, expressed in months, reflecting inspection rigor and risk-based oversight.

YEAR_RECONSTRUCTED_106_DIFF.description: The number of years that have elapsed since the bridge was last reconstructed or substantially rehabilitated, indicating the recency of major renewal work.

PERCENT_ADT_TRUCK_109.description: The proportion of average daily traffic composed of trucks, reflecting heavy vehicle usage and its impact on structural loading and deterioration.

FUTURE_ADT_114.description: The projected average daily traffic expected to use the bridge in the future, representing anticipated demand growth and long-term capacity needs.

DECK_AREA.description: The total surface area of the bridge deck, representing the extent of the riding surface exposed to traffic loads and environmental effects.
